Question
========

The probability of winning €100 in a gambling game is 0.1 and the probability of losing €10 is 0.9. Calculate the average amount a player will win per gamble if he plays the gambling game for a long time. What is the win or loss per game?

Answerlist
----------

* € 0.00 (no profit or loss)
* € 1.00 (profit)
* - € 10.00 (loss)
* € 100.00 (profit)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* €0.00 (no profit or loss): Incorrect
* € 1.00 (profit): Correct
* - € 10.00 (loss): Incorrect
* € 100.00 (profit): Incorrect
